meaning_str.bing:

v. 飞；飞翔；航行；（乘航空器或航天器）航行
网络. 飞行；放；飞扬

sogou-CET6.v: 飞; 飞翔; 航行[出现13次)]

sogou-CET4.v: 飞; 飞翔; 航行[出现11次)];猛然移动[出现1次)];空运[出现0次)]

sogou-gaokao.v: 飞行; 飞[出现9次)];驾驶; 操纵[出现4次)];(时间)飞逝[出现1次)]

sogou-zhongkao.v: 飞; 飞翔; 航行[出现184次)];空运[出现2次)]

1.en: happiness on hand is simple and transparent, just as two geese fly across the sky together.
1.cn: 紧握手里的幸福应该是简单而透明的。就像两只大雁，依偎在一起飞过天空，哪么简单。那么快乐。

2.en: In the vestibule, as I'm buttoning my fly, I notice one of them waiting for her friend to come out of the can.
2.cn: 我正在走廊里系裤扣，便看到其中一个女人在等她朋友从厕所里出来。

3.en: We, students of class 11, are just like this pigeon, ready to expand our wings and fly to the vast blue sky!
3.cn: 我们11班的所有同学也正像这只鸽子一样，正蓄势待发地展开双翅，飞向辽阔的蓝天！

0.en: No, I fibbed. I can fly. Just not every day.
0.cn: 没有，我只是没说清，我能飞，但不是每天都能飞。

1.en: Then, why don't you? All the other fairies fly.
1.cn: 那为什么你没有？其他的仙女都会飞。

2.en: Israel says they're prepared to enforce the no-fly zone.
2.cn: 以色列说他们打算执行禁飞区令。

3.en: I can't! But in desperate situations, apparently I can fly!
3.cn: 是啊！不过在紧急情况下，我连飞都会！

4.cn: 好吧，这六小时一定过得"飞快"。

5.en: Yes, yes! The Slushious will fly again. Yes!
5.cn: 可以的！飞船一定可以修好的。太棒啦！

6.en: You ready? There we go. Hey buddy, cars don't fly. Hey, cars don't fly. This one did?
6.cn: 准备好了吗？我们要出发啦，喂，儿子，车是不会飞的噢，车不会飞，这辆会的，对吧？

7.en: And she fell. And she flew. Where did she fly? Tomorrow. Tomorrow?
7.cn: 然后掉下去了。她飞起来了。飞去哪儿了? 明天。明天?

8.en: If you could fly, what you must do is fly up to her, start flying down at the speed she is falling, hold on to her, then gradually slow down until you come to a complete stop.
8.cn: 假如你会飞，你必须飞上去接住她，然后以她下落的速度往下飞，抱紧她，然后慢慢减速直到完全停住。

9.en: Or human. Yes, a human who can fly as a bat.
9.cn: 或者人类。对，一个可以像蝙蝠一样飞的人类。

10.en: You know, it's really upsetting to me that you're the only bird that can fly and you're too afraid to do it.
10.cn: 我很失望，明明我们鸟类之中只有你会飞，可是你却不肯飞。

11.en: Where are we going to get water from? We must fly around the world in aeroplanes. Peppa and her friends are pretending to fly around the world, looking for water.
11.cn: 我们要从哪里取水呢？我们要坐飞机在全世界飞来飞去。佩奇和她的朋友们在全世界飞来飞去找水。

12.en: You can post the card here. Goodbye, postcard. Fly home quickly.
12.cn: 你可以把明信片投在这。再见明信片，快点飞回家。

13.en: Your turn. My stage name is Angel. It kind of fits. You can fly?
13.cn: 该你了。我的艺名叫“天使”， 挺合适。你会飞？

14.en: You can post the card here. Goodbye, postcard. Fly home quickly.
14.cn: 你可以把明信片投在这。再见明信片，快点飞回家。

15.en: Whew. That was a brisk ride. Take the top down, did you? Only way to fly.
15.cn: 哦，真是痛快。你开了篷吧？跟飞上天差不多。

16.en: Is the window open? Because if the window's open a bird could fly in and…
16.cn: 窗户有开着吗？如果开着 鸟可能会飞进来然后……

17.en: How are we gonna get over those walls? I'll tell you how. We're gonna fly.
17.cn: 我们要怎么翻过那一圈城墙？我有主意了，我们飞过去。

18.en: A boy, so says the prophecy, who could fly. Have you come to kill me, Peter?
18.cn: 这个男孩，在预言里，可以飞。你是来杀我的吗，彼得？

19.en: When the third moon rises, he must fly. If he lives, he's the one.
19.cn: 当月亮第三次升起，他必须能飞起来，如果他能平安回来，他就是预言之子。
